author: cnbc.com
title: GCI to Announce Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings
text:
ANCHORAGE, Alaska, Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WHO:
GCI (NASDAQ: GNCMA)
WHAT:
GCI will issue its fourth quarter 2017 earnings release after the market closes on Wed., Feb. 28, 2018. The financial release will be available at www.gci.com .
Due to the pending transactions between GCI and Liberty Interactive Corporation (NASDAQ: QVCA, QVCB, LVNTA, LVNTB), GCI will not hold a conference call to review these results.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/gci-to-announce-fourth-quarter-2017-earnings-300592358.html
SOURCE GCI
